name: Angular-online-status
tagline: An angular directive that sets a rootscope variable of online depending on your current network status.
body:
# angular-online-status

An angular directive module that sets a rootscope variable of ``online`` to either true or false depending on your current network status.

### Authors and Contributors
Will Chiong (@infomofo)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
